thread.title: Karen Clifton shows off athletic figure in hilarious workout video with pet dog: watch
thread.title_full: Karen Clifton shows off athletic figure in hilarious workout video with pet dog: watch

title: Karen Clifton shows off athletic figure in hilarious workout video with pet dog: watch
text:
Karen Clifton shows off athletic figure in hilarious workout video with pet dog: watch   hellomagazine.com Karen Clifton teamed up with her adorable pet dog Betty for a workout session which shared on Instagram on Tuesday Leave a comment 
She is one of the most beloved professional dancers on Strictly Come Dancing , so it's no wonder Karen Clifton has an incredibly toned physique. The 34-year-old - who is married to fellow Strictly dancer Kevin Clifton - took to her Instagram page on Tuesday to post one of her many workout videos. The latest one sees Karen join forces with her adorable pet pooch Betty as she shared her fitness tips with followers. "Today's warm up is brought to you by my sidekick Betty wiggles," she captioned the video. 
Dressed in a black leotard, the dancer flaunted her lean and slender frame in all its glory while she pranced around her living room. She also posted another video, urging fans to think of motivational ways to do exercises. Sharing one tip, she wrote: "Dusting off my floor with my lil sidekick Betty wiggles. Keeping in form and always finding new ways to make my workouts fun. Remember: Love yourself today." [sic] A post shared by Karen Clifton (@karencliftonofficial) on Feb 21, 2017 at 5:00am PST 
Take a look behind the scenes of Kevin and Karen Cliftonâ€™s tour 
Meanwhile, Karen and her husband Kevin are no doubt gearing up for their tour, which kicks off in July. Speaking to HELLO! about their exciting new project , Karen revealed: "The tour is something we have always thought about doing since we met. We love performing in a theatre. It's something that sits very close to our hearts. We met in a theatre, we got engaged in a theatre, now the best thing to do is perform our dream show in a theatre." Kevin & Karen DANCE will be based on the married couple's life and how they grew up in different countries and their influences while growing up.
